item.title: Help for ++REP please
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

I’m working on this thing and it suppost to work when you click this and a object shows but only you can see object. I want to make it so others can see object heres my code.
ClickingButtons.java

case xxx:// Rock if (!c.inBusy()) { c.sendMessage("You have to be in a Safe area to make this object!"); return; } if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay) < 2000) { return; } if ((c.playerLevel[22] >= 1) && c.inBusy() && c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 10000)) { c.sendMessage("You build a very strong Rock."); c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 100000); c.getPA().addSkillXP(150, 22); c.startAnimation(xxxx); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(0000, c.absX, c.absY, 1, 0); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 100k To make this rock."); } }
